text: Only God Forgives is a 2013 action movie written and directed by Nicolas Winding Refn. Ryan Gosling, Kristin Scott Thomas, Vithaya Pansringarm and Rhatha Phongam are in it. Refn filmed the movie in Bangkok, Thailand. The 2013 Cannes Film Festival showed the movie. == References == ==Other websites== * Category:2013 action movies Category:2013 crime movies Category:2013 drama movies Category:Danish action movies Category:Danish crime movies Category:Danish drama movies Category:French action movies Category:French crime movies Category:French drama movies Category:American action movies Category:American crime drama movies Category:Swedish action movies Category:Swedish crime movies Category:Swedish drama movies Category:Belgian action movies Category:Belgian crime movies Category:Belgian drama movies Category:Thai movies Category:Movies directed by Nicolas Winding Refn
title: Only God Forgives
